search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SavvyCal (savvycal.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for SavvyCal is available at this URL: [https://savvycal.com/pricing](https://savvycal.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Plans & Pricing · SavvyCal
===============

[](https://savvycal.com/)

*   [Features](https://savvycal.com/features)
*   [Pricing](https://savvycal.com/pricing)
*   [What’s New](https://changelog.savvycal.com/)

*   [Login](https://savvycal.com/login)
*   [Sign up](https://savvycal.com/signup)

Join thousands of happy customers
=================================

Kick the tires for free and only upgrade when you’re ready to activate.  
Backed by a 30-day money back guarantee.

[Get Started](https://savvycal.com/signup)

### SavvyCal Basic

Great for individuals & small teams with simple scheduling needs.

*   ![Image 1](https://d1dpdedfiyqa92.cloudfront.net/assets/thumbs-up-19b39d69c969ef9247df501228f1bca2.png?vsn=d)Unlimited calendars
    
*   ![Image 2](https://d1dpdedfiyqa92.cloudfront.net/assets/thumbs-up-19b39d69c969ef9247df501228f1bca2.png?vsn=d)Unlimited links
    
*   ![Image 3](https://d1dpdedfiyqa92.cloudfront.net/assets/thumbs-up-19b39d69c969ef9247df501228f1bca2.png?vsn=d)Team scheduling
    

$12/user/month

### SavvyCal Premium

Ideal for businesses who need a bit more control over their scheduling flows.

*   ![Image 4](https://d1dpdedfiyqa92.cloudfront.net/assets/thumbs-up-19b39d69c969ef9247df501228f1bca2.png?vsn=d)Whitelabeled booking pages
    
*   ![Image 5](https://d1dpdedfiyqa92.cloudfront.net/assets/thumbs-up-19b39d69c969ef9247df501228f1bca2.png?vsn=d)Delegate to an assistant
    
*   ![Image 6](https://d1dpdedfiyqa92.cloudfront.net/assets/thumbs-up-19b39d69c969ef9247df501228f1bca2.png?vsn=d)Custom domains
    
*   ![Image 7](https://d1dpdedfiyqa92.cloudfront.net/assets/thumbs-up-19b39d69c969ef9247df501228f1bca2.png?vsn=d)Paid bookings
    

$20/user/month

![Image 8](https://d1dpdedfiyqa92.cloudfront.net/assets/pieter-388954958a1a233f8ada796e94c46dca.jpg?vsn=d)

“I feel more comfortable sharing a SavvyCal link than any other scheduling link.”

Pieter Beulque

Product lead at Summit

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Do you offer a free trial?
--------------------------

You can sign up for free and get your account ready to go. You can also use meeting polls free of charge!

When you’re ready to activate scheduling links for others to use, you’ll need to upgrade to a paid plan. If you’re not happy with the service, you can request a refund in your first thirty days, no questions asked.

How does company billing work?
------------------------------

SavvyCal is billed on a per-user basis. When you create a team in SavvyCal and invite your colleagues, we’ll grant them paid access and adjust your subscription seat count to match your usage. We’ll also keep your seat count in sync when you remove someone from your organization.

Are there ways to save?
-----------------------

Yes! You get two months free when you sign up for an annual plan. If you’re a student, educator, or non-profit, you can save 25% — just reach out to our support team to lock in your discount.

Do you offer an affiliate program?
----------------------------------

Yes! Anyone can join our [affiliate program](https://savvycal.getrewardful.com/) and earn a 25% commission on all business you refer to us (subject to [terms](https://savvycal.getrewardful.com/terms)).

What happens if I cancel?
-------------------------

When you cancel, your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period. After that, we’ll deactivate your links but keep your data around (as long as you don’t delete your account).

When you’re ready to come back, you can reactivate your subscription. You can still continue to overlay your calendar on other people’s links and enjoy our free features, like meeting polls.

Made in America 🇺🇸

© 2025 SavvyCal, Inc.

[Follow us on Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/savvycal.com)
